rules_text:
Flying
Haunt [i](When this creature dies, exile it haunting target creature.)[/i]
As long as The Jailbreak King is in exile haunting a creature, you control that creature.
{4}{U}{B}: If The Jailbreak King is in exile haunting a creature, return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control. [i](That creature is no longer haunted)[/i]
